channel.title: An Avatar I have created. All custom, Forum Moderator crown
channel.description:
Here is something that I worked VERY hard on and took me a couple of hours to get the colors to blend just right.
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/800/avatarforforums.png[/img]
No, I did not use any major program for this. Believe it or not, this was 100% completely made in paint. This goes to show that something amazing can be made there. o.O I wanted it to be custom and unique. The stars AND the crown were completely made by me, taking hours of my time to make it perfect. Nowhere on the internet will you ever find an image close to this. I personally think the crown looks amazing, and have never seen one that looked like that, ever. The "f" in it stand for "Forums" So I just thought I'd share it with everyone to see! Tell me how I did, I'd love to hear! ;)

item.title: An Avatar I have created. All custom, Forum Moderator crown
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

It’s 100x100 which is the size of the avatars on another forum that I go on which is why I made it that size. I just thought I’d share it on these forums. I do have a smaller version of it but it’s a bit different from this one and not as good.

Read full topic
